description.value:
Prerequisite(s): None
Range: Melee attack
Target: One creature
Duration: Instantaneous (see text)

Description

A snip here, a cut there, and soon your opponent's defenses are in shambles. Make a melee attack. If successful, you deal damage as normal and the target is tricked for a number of rounds equal to your initiation modifier. Additionally, this strike gains an extra effect of your choice. The target must make a Reflex save (DC 15 + initiation modifier) or: Lose their natural armor bonus to AC for 1 round. Lose their armor and shield bonus to AC for 1 round. Exploit: The target gains a -4 on their saving throws for 1 round, including the save against this strike.
